AuthText.logoutModalDesc: Are you want to log out ?

overview.title: Overview
overview.content: Magic Flux operates the website https://magicflux.ai/ and is committed to protecting your privacy. This privacy policy outlines the types of information we collect, how we use it, and the steps we take to ensure your personal information is handled appropriately.

personalData.title: Personal Data
personalData.content: We collect personal data that you voluntarily provide to us, including but not limited to:
personalData.name: Name
personalData.purpose: This information is collected for the purpose of order processing on our Magic Flux Directory.

nonPersonalData.title: Non-Personal Data
nonPersonalData.content: We also collect non-personal data through web cookies, which includes usage details like your IP address, browser type, and pages visited on our site. This data is used to enhance your experience on our website.

purposeOfDataCollection.title: Purpose of Data Collection
purposeOfDataCollection.content: The primary purpose of collecting your data is to process your orders and improve our website's functionality and services.

dataSharing.title: Data Sharing
dataSharing.content: Magic Flux respects your privacy. We do not share your personal data with any third parties, except as necessary to process your orders or comply with legal requirements.

childrensPrivacy.title: Children's Privacy
childrensPrivacy.content: Our services are not intended for children under the age of 18. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children.

updates.title: Updates to This Privacy Policy
updates.content: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Effective Date" at the top. We will also inform you via email of significant changes.

contactUs.title: Contact Us
contactUs.content: If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy, please contact us: channelerH@gmail.com.

TermsOfService.title: Terms of Service for Magic Flux

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to Magic Flux. By accessing our website (https://magicflux.ai), you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service, all applicable laws and regulations, and agree that you are responsible for compliance with any applicable local laws. If you do not agree with any of these terms, you are prohibited from using or accessing this site.

useLicense.title: Use License
useLicense.content: Permission is granted to temporarily download one copy of the materials (information or software) on Magic Flux's website for personal, non-commercial transitory viewing only. This is the grant of a license, not a transfer of title, and under this license, you may not:

restrictions.useCommercially: use the materials for any commercial purpose, or for any public display (commercial or non-commercial);
restrictions.decompile: attempt to decompile or reverse engineer any software contained on Magic Flux's website;
restrictions.remove: remove any copyright or other proprietary notations from the materials; or
restrictions.transfer: transfer the materials to another person or "mirror" the materials on any other server.

useLicense.termination: This license shall automatically terminate if you violate any of these restrictions and may be terminated by Magic Flux at any time. Upon terminating your viewing of these materials or upon the termination of this license, you must destroy any downloaded materials in your possession whether in electronic or printed format.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: The materials on Magic Flux's website are provided on an 'as is' basis. Magic Flux makes no warranties, expressed or implied, and hereby disclaims and negates all other warranties including, without limitation, implied warranties or conditions of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, or non-infringement of intellectual property or other violation of rights.

limitations.title: Limitations
limitations.content: In no event shall Magic Flux or its suppliers be liable for any damages (including, without limitation, damages for loss of data or profit, or due to business interruption) arising out of the use or inability to use the materials on Magic Flux's website, even if Magic Flux or a Magic Flux authorized representative has been notified orally or in writing of the possibility of such damage.

accuracyOfMaterials.title: Accuracy of Materials
accuracyOfMaterials.content: The materials appearing on Magic Flux's website could include technical, typographical, or photographic errors. Magic Flux does not warrant that any of the materials on its website are accurate, complete, or current. Magic Flux may make changes to the materials contained on its website at any time without notice. However, Magic Flux does not make any commitment to update the materials.

links.title: Links
links.content: Magic Flux has not reviewed all of the sites linked to its website and is not responsible for the contents of any such linked site. The inclusion of any link does not imply endorsement by Magic Flux of the site. Use of any such linked website is at the user's own risk.

modifications.title: Modifications
modifications.content: Magic Flux may revise these Terms of Service for its website at any time without notice. By using this website, you are agreeing to be bound by the then current version of these Terms of Service.

governingLaw.title: Governing Law
governingLaw.content: These terms and conditions are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the USA and you irrevocably submit to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts in that State or location.

contactUs.title: Contact Us
contactUs.content: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us channeleH@gmail.com.
